title: Firefox home page search bar doesn't allow input.
content: Until recently, I was able to type in the search bar that appears in the middle of the page whenever I'm at the Firefox home page, but now any time I try to type or paste anything there, it automatically puts it in the address bar at the top. I can click on that bar, and a blinking cursor appears, indicating that I should be able to type there, but it still puts everything in the address bar. This only happens with that page, and nowhere else. Why is it doing this, and how to I make it stop doing that?
creator: aklarii

title: Web sites not showing correctly with Firefox 91.0
content:
Hi,

Some websites will suddenly only show parts of the content after I upgraded to 91.0. I tried to look at the websites with Chrome and it's no problem with the same web sites. I have tried "Trouble shooting mode" but the problem in Firefox is still there. I'm running Firefox on a Mac OS with Big Sur 11.5.1 Anybody having the same problem and know how to fix it?

Kind regards, Cath
creator: schlyter.catharina

title: Firefox on debian linux keeps depositing a windows virus in its cache.
content: Firefox on Debian Linux with no modules or extensions enabled keeps installing a windows virus in it's cache. Other browsers don't do this so it's something with firefox.
creator: dayscondor

title: Firefox 91.0 Dark & Light - Here we go again
content:
I have my Windows Colours settings as Custom which has Windows default mode as Dark and default app mode as Light and this has been working fine with FF until now!

The drop down lists on the Menu Bar are now showing everything in white text with a black background when I want it to show in black text with a white background which it used to do.

The URL area and background in new tabs show correctly with light background and dark text and if I use Edge or Chrome they also work correctly so what's been changed in FF ?!?

This used to work as I wanted but now I can't find any way to change it so if anyone has any suggestions on how I can fix this, that would be great.

Thanks.
creator: da4658

title: Firefox display does not show background fill and has bold table borders
content: I run Firefox on my Mac. Recently, the display of internet pages has changed by not showing background fill colors and showing bold borders of table cells. Images show what I see currently versus what displays on other devices (and on Firefox until recently). I cannot find a way to return the display to its previous settings. Thanks for any advice and assistance.

title: Control of bookmarks
content: Bookmarks is frustrating me. Perhaps I haven't understood the changes and how to use them? I set my first bookmark to go to a specific folder and after that, every single bookmark goes into the same folder. I have to go in and use the "edit" function to get the latest bookmark to the right location. What am I missing or doing incorrectly? Thanks in advance to all Gurus who answer.
creator: sandwichbay

title: All web pages have white background and look abnormal after new update
content: Ever since updating my firefox, all the webpages seem to be glitched and have all white backgrounds and blue texts where there should be none. Also white bars appear on certain menus. I have put on troubleshoot mode and it is still the same. Please look at the pictures to see. Even this mozilla site looks off and is all white with missing details.

title: Remove "Add (search engine name)" on right click URL line
content:
When I right click on URL line for websites that offer their own search engine, I see an "Add (webpage name) at bottom of drop down menu (YouTube website a good example).

How do I disable that feature. I don't want to see the "Add" function on the drop down menu.

title: Firefox updated - messed everything up
content:
Hi all,

I downloaded the latest version of Firefox on August 16, 2021. Everything looks messed up - there are black lines around tons of boxes, color has been lost on most pages including in my email and on my Google calendar. What the hell happened and how do I fix this? It's unusable like this.

Thank you, Carey
